sqlMap.statement: SELECT WORKGRPCD AS "WORKGRPCD", ADPTRCD AS "ADPTRCD", ADPTRBZWKNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKNAME", ADPTRDESC AS "ADPTRDESC", SNDRCVKIND AS "SNDRCVKIND", ADPTRKIND AS "ADPTRKIND", JNDIDATASOURCE AS "JNDIDATASOURCE", ENC1 AS "ENC1" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 WHERE adptrCd=#adptrCd#

SELECT A.ADPTRCD AS "ADPTRCD" , A.ADPTRCDSEQ AS "ADPTRCDSEQ" , A.INTFID AS "INTFID" , A.SQLNAME AS "SQLNAME" , A.SQLNAMEDESC AS "SQLNAMEDESC" , A.SELECTUNITCNT AS "SELECTUNITCNT" , A.LAYOUTKEY AS "LAYOUTKEY" , A.DBSQL AS "DBSQL" , A.CODECKEY AS "CODECKEY" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 B WHERE A.adptrCd = B.adptrCd AND A.adptrCd = #adptrCd# ORDER BY A.adptrCdSeq

SELECT ADPTRCD AS "ADPTRCD" , ADPTRCDSEQ AS "ADPTRCDSEQ" , INTFID AS "INTFID" , FTPNAME AS "FTPNAME" , FTPNAMEDESC AS "FTPNAMEDESC" , FTPHOSTNAME AS "FTPHOSTNAME" , RMTSEVRFTPPORTNONAME AS "RMTSEVRFTPPORTNONAME" , RMTSEVRFTPUID AS "RMTSEVRFTPUID" , FTPARCHIVEDIR AS "FTPARCHIVEDIR" , FTPTYPE AS "FTPTYPE" , FTPSTOREFILEPATTERN AS "FTPSTOREFILEPATTERN" , NEXTOPTION AS "NEXTOPTION" , CHECKNAME AS "CHECKNAME" , FTPCHECKDIR AS "FTPCHECKDIR" , SYSTEMNAME AS "SYSTEMNAME" , SYSTEMOWNER AS "SYSTEMOWNER" , SYSTEMOWNERTELEPHONE AS "SYSTEMOWNERTELEPHONE" , SYSTEMOTHERTXT AS "SYSTEMOTHERTXT" , SECTIONVAL AS "SECTIONVAL" , LAYOUTKEY AS "LAYOUTKEY" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 WHERE adptrCd=#adptrCd# ORDER BY adptrCdSeq

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02( workGrpCd, adptrBzwkName, adptrCd, adptrDesc, sndRcvKind, adptrKind, jndiDatasource, enc1 ) VALUES (#workGrpCd#, #adptrBzwkName#, #adptrCd#, #adptrDesc#, #sndRcvKind#, #adptrKind#, #jndiDatasource#, #enc1# )
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIEA02 SET adptrBzwkName =#adptrBzwkName#, adptrDesc =#adptrDesc#, jndiDatasource =#jndiDatasource#, enc1 =#enc1# WHERE adptrCd =#adptrCd#
